**Physical disturbance pressures from bottom-contacting fishing gears and their impacts on seabed habitats for the Greater North Sea sub-region and five subdivisions**

#  {.tabset .tabset-fade .tabset-pills}

```{r ReadData, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, include=FALSE}
library(dplyr)
library(kableExtra)
library(knitr)
library(readtext)

reg_dat <- c("Greater North Sea","Northern_NS","Kattegat_NS","Southern_NS","Channel_NS","NTrench_NS")
name_dat <- c("Greater North Sea","Northern North Sea","Kattegat","Southern North Sea","English Channel", "Norwegian Trench")
reg <- 1
ecoregion <- reg_dat[reg]
econame <- name_dat[reg]

# set pathdir
pathdir_mark <- "C:\\Users\\danie\\Documents\\Online for git\\WKTRADE3\\5 - Output"

outputs <- paste(pathdir_mark,"\\(sub-)region\\",ecoregion,"\\",sep='')
outtext <- paste(pathdir_mark,"\\(sub-)region\\",ecoregion,"\\Assessment text\\",sep='')

```

## Read me {.tabset}

```{r echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}
outtext <- paste(pathdir_mark,"\\(sub-)Region\\Greater North Sea\\Assessment text\\",sep="")
Readme <- readtext(paste(outtext,"Read me1.txt",sep=''))
```
`r Readme$text`

```{r echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}
hab <- read.csv(paste(outtext,"Indicator_table.csv",sep=''),sep=";")
nam <-  names(hab)

kable(hab, col.names = nam, caption="Table 1. Pressure and impact indicators that are applied by (sub-)regional, subdivision sea, or broadscale habitat type within that sea at a 0.05° × 0.05° grid, hereafter termed c-square.",format = "html", table.attr = "style='width:90%;'", align='l') %>% 
  kable_styling(font_size=12)

```
